item.title: How to write clearly
item.author: Manwei Liu
item.description: Here are the references for my bachelor course How to write clearly. Highly recommended Joseph M. Williams, Style: Toward Clarity and Grace (Chicago Guides to Writing, Editing, and Publishing, 1990) 中文版：《风格：写作的清晰与优雅》（北京大学出版社，2020） Stven Pinker, The sense of style (Penguin Books, 2014)
